definitions.definition: The downward slope of a curve.
A downward bend in a path .
An inward curve of the exoskeleton of an insect , such as between body segments ; a segment of an insect's body where the exoskeleton curves inward.

main_definition: ( geomorphology ) The downward slope of a curve.
secondary_definitions: A downward bend in a path .
( entomology ) An inward curve of the exoskeleton of an insect , such as between body segments ; a segment of an insect's body where the exoskeleton curves inward.
